attributes.action: I robot, ask Tony Blair to accept that he had a good run for his money and that he should now just quietly go away and allow dithering Gordon to get on with it until the next election (which he will avoid calling until the very last moment).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
